title: Binary cyclic group
summary: In mathematics, the binary cyclic group of the n-gon is the cyclic group of order 2n, C 2 n {\displaystyle C_{2n}} , thought of as an extension of the cyclic group C n {\displaystyle C_{n}} by a cyclic group of order 2. Coxeter writes the binary cyclic group with angle-brackets, ⟨n⟩, and the index 2 subgroup as (n) or [n]+.
